Prior evidence suggest disorder may effectively treat cognitive behavior therapy ( CBT ) , access psychological treatment limit . One possible solution provide therapy via Internet , show effective anxiety disorder depression . In present study , investigate efficacy Internet-based CBT ( ICBT ) adjustment disorder burnout syndrom randomize control trial ( N=100 ) . DOC.brief_title: Internet-based Cognitive Behavior Therapy Stress Disorders : Randomized Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Stress disorder form adjustment disorder burnout syndrom highly prevalent cause substantial suffering . Prior evidence suggest disorder may effectively treat cognitive behavior therapy ( CBT ) , access psychological treatment limit . One possible solution provide therapy via Internet , show effective anxiety disorder depression . Internet-based CBT describe online bibliotherapy therapist support via secure messaging system . In study psychologist deliver treatment . We investigate efficacy Internet-based CBT ( ICBT ) adjustment disorder burnout syndrom randomize control trial ( N=100 ) . Participants randomize active treatment ( n=50 ) control condition wait list . We expect participant receive ICBT make superior improvement compare control condition measure stress , burnout , depressive symptom , general anxiety general functioning .
DOC.criteria: To include study participant must 18 65 year age suffer primary stressrelated disorder meet diagnostic criterion adjustment disorder burnout syndrome . Participants must access computer Internet , well able write write Swedish . Exclusion criterion include ( ) meeting criterion another axis1 diagnosis assess primary area difficulty , ( b ) suffer substance abuse/dependence past 6 month , ( c ) suffer current past psychosis bipolar disorder , ( ) moderate high suicide risk , ( e ) initiate changed pharmachological treatment depression anxiety past month ( f ) ongoing psychological treatment stressrelated difficulty , ( g ) receive CBT stressrelated illhealth past year .
